name: py-requests-cache

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
A persistent HTTP cache that provides an easy way to get better
performance with the python requests library.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-urllib3
dependencies.description: HTTP library with thread-safe connection pooling, file post, and more.

dependencies.name: py-cattrs
dependencies.description: An open source Python library for structuring and unstructuring data.

dependencies.name: py-appdirs
dependencies.description:
A small Python module for determining appropriate platform-specific
dirs, e.g. a "user data dir".
